author: wmtan
body: In preparation for removing framework support for deprecated auto_ptr arguments in put() calls, this pull request replaces the use of auto_ptr with unique_ptr in the package L1Trigger L1TMuonEndCap. Also, std::make_unique is used when appropriate. L1Trigger was converted to unique_ptr months ago, but additional calls of put(auto_ptr) were introduced since then.
title: Use unique_ptr, not auto_ptr in L1Trigger (again)
